Articles.Content:
So have been looking for som new mods to improve my ksp expierence. But need some other advice from you guys.

So far i have gotten the following mods:

- Deadly reentry, FAR og Ioncross CrewSupport (to make game more realistic)

- Remotetech and probe compatibility

- Proc Fairings and KAS (make cooler rockets/ships)

- Chatterer (for atmosphere)

- Subassembly loader and engineer to help rocket assembly

- mechjeb and Lazor Docking Cam for better maneuvers

Does any of you know mods to ad internal storing, robot arms and other cool rocket parts, that works with .21 (no overpowered tanks or motors please)? Know about SpaceJunk Cargo Bay, Infernal Robotics, Damned Robotics and Robotic Arms Pack. But with onces work best?

Edit: mods that add bigger parts (3 and 5 meter or bigger parts for spaceships) are very welcome also.

Edited July 30, 2013 by Romby
KW Rocketry and NovaPunch are pretty good part addons, although I hear KW Rocketry may be discontinued. Either way, I recommend checking out both.
I use kethane and mechjeb 2, that's all. May install docking cam again, but don't have the fine motor control needed to dock manually anyway.

Quantum struts is a good mod if you like performing orbital construction. I found its great for reinforcing docking ports because even the 2m docking ports are so strong. The new SAS system makes this less necessary because it doesn't wobble as bad but its still nice to add rigidity.

Also, if you like spaceplanes the B9 is the package to get. The S2 fuselage system is well setup for making SSTO spaceplanes.
How is B9 and Novapunch for adding OP parts (tanks and engines outpreforming stock parts in weight/fuel or thrust/fuelconsumption?

Novapunch works, B9 crashes my KSP.], enough said

Nova is the way to go, so versatile.
